#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<map>
#define in cin
#define out cout
using namespace std;
const long double eps = 1e-9;
long double calc(long double p,long double n){
    return (1-pow((p/100),n))*p;
}
long double ans(long double n){
    long double p=0,pas=100;
    while(pas>eps){
        if(p+pas<=100 && calc(p+pas,n) > calc(p+pas-eps,n)) p+=pas;
        pas/=2;
    }
    return p;
}
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    ifstream in("test.in");
    ofstream out("test.out");
    #endif
    int t,n;
    for(in>>t;t;t--){
        in>>n;
        out.precision(9);
        out<<fixed<<ans((long double)(n))<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
